article_text: The desire to have a quick, noncontroversial legislative session must not distract state lawmakers from their obligation to watchdog the state’s inpatient psychiatric hospitals, where costly and potentially dangerous problems seem to be multiplying.

article_metadata.title: State hospital problems are multiplying | The Wichita Eagle
